intro: Psychotria hexandra subsp. oahuensis, commonly known as the Oahu psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many tropical plants. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in humid forest understories. Due to its restricted distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
